title: Voice Command Simplification
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use simple voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can stay socially connected and maintain my independence despite my reduced mobility.

title: Conversational Engagement – Reminders for Social Interactions
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me of important social interactions and volunteering activities so that I can stay connected with my community and manage my busy schedule effectively.

title: Voice-Activated Task Management
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice commands to manage my calendar and stay connected with my family and volunteer activities, so that I can maintain my social connections and manage my busy schedule with ease despite my reduced mobility.

title: Personalized News and Information Retrieval
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide me with personalized news and information feeds so that I can stay updated on community issues and events relevant to my volunteering and social interests.

title: Error Recovery and Clarification – Contextual Hints for Task Guidance
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide contextual hints and guidance when I encounter difficulties with voice commands so that I can maintain effective communication and manage my tasks without frustration.

title: Voice Interaction with Touch Controls
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice commands and simple touch controls to manage my daily tasks and stay connected with my family and community, so that I can maintain my independence and continue my volunteer work despite my reduced mobility.

title: Customizable Interaction Styles for Enhanced Communication
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to customize how I interact with ALFRED so that I can easily manage my communication, stay connected with my family, and schedule my volunteering activities without frustration.

title: Emergency Response Activation – Voice-Triggered Alerts for Emergency Contacts
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to be able to trigger emergency alerts with my voice so that I can quickly notify my family or caregivers in case of an emergency without needing to navigate complex technology.
